mapper.insert: INSERT INTO route ( routeName, routeUserId, routeTraffic, routeStartLocation, routeEndLocation, routeStartLatitude, routeStartLongitude, routeEndLatitude, routeEndLongitude,routeTime, routeDistance, routeOrder) VALUES ( #{routeName},#{routeUserId}, #{routeTraffic}, #{routeStartLocation}, #{routeEndLocation}, #{routeStartLatitude}, #{routeStartLongitude}, #{routeEndLatitude}, #{routeEndLongitude}, #{routeTime}, #{routeDistance}, #{routeOrder})
mapper.select: SELECT count(*) totalRowsRoute from route where routeUserId=#{routeUserId};
